After having 100+ hours on a non-steam version of this game (v34).
i can now write a review, and i love this game, much more than GO.
The graphics look beautiful in my opinion.

p.s you'll get used to the "fire in the hole!" thing :P

My first time playing this game in about 8 years and it's still one of the best FPS games out there. With the day and age of Call of Duty and Battlefield, it's nice to kick back and get nostalgic from playing games like CS:S and surprisingly a lot of people still actively play the game. I'd definitely recommend this game to anyone who hasn't already bought it. For just 25 bucks you can get the entire Valve collection on holiday sale.
This game is the best which we played

Why is this more expensive than CS:GO

This is an amazing game, i recommend it. Even though cs go is out, it is still a good investment  because  its simple, it has no lag, and it is very addictive and fun. However,  just like any other game, it still has its flaws for exaple, its almost impossible to mute the people on theyre mics. And i find that very  annoying. Additionally, it is a little complicated to play single player if your new to the game. Other than that the game is fantastic and very popular

ight lets be real, most of the people who bought this game did so, so you can cop the textures fo garrys mod. cuz lets be real, if you're gunna spend more than 20$ on a counterstrike game, you might as well buy cs:go. But im there with all u peeps that need this game for garrys mod, or if you aint here for that then listen up af. I didnt actually start playing source tht quickly. I installed it, then went straight to play gmod, but gmod gets boring after a month or two of binge gaming. so i tried cs source. it didnt do much for me at first. there are two teams, counter terrorists and terrorists(or cts and ts). There are two scenarios, one is where the ts have to plant a bomb at a bomb site and the cts have to stop them. the other is where the t's have hostages and the cts have to save the hostages. For the most part its not very coordinated, many people do not talk with a mic so there isnt a lot of team coordination. but i hardly ever play those gamemodes. THE REAL SHIT are the modded servers. LIKE HOLY FUCK. they are so FUCKIN AMAZING AND FUN. The zombie mod and jailbreak are two of the most entertaining things i can do on my computer. Even with games in the total war series and cs:go in my library. The community on those games are hella friendly and fun to be around. the admins keep it a hunna and its just a great time. BUY THIS GAME, YOU WONT REGRET, BUT TRY OUT THE MODDED SERVERS  BEFORE YOU TAKE A SHIT ON IT!!!!
doesn't even have killstreaks or wall riding.
no hacks rusos= mejor que cs go

Достоинства: Преобразованы карты, улучшены модели игроков и оружия.

Недостатки: Нельзя простреливать через стены как в Counter Strike 1.6.

Отзыв: Хороший онлайн шутер, в него играть проще чем в Counter Strike 1.6 т. к в Counter Strike Source хорошая графика и фигурки игроков чуть-чуть больше чем в 1.6, изменены модели некоторых оружий, преобразованы карты, сейчас нежели 10-12 лет назад, всё больше людей переходит на Counter Strike Source . Но теперь нельзя простреливать через стены как в Counter Strike 1.

Remember when any gun on the game had the potential to win a round?
Remember when the AK-47 was still picked the most even though it didn't make much of a difference?
Remember that beautiful silencer animation?
Remember all the Russians and others not in America but still on American servers?
Remeber that Garry's Mod made you want this game for the textures, but you ended up playing this more instead?
Remember when the video stress test would drop you below 20 fps?
Remember when bots were actually a threat on easy mode?
Remember when your skills were not judged by your knives and weapon skins?
Remember when an MLG pro AWPer could get killed by a friggin' UMP??
Remember when that ten year old who yelled at you for killing him? No? Oh yeah, that's because only grown men play this beautiful game.

10/10 - CS:GO doesn't even come close.

Играл в нее давно еще в ноустим версию проиграл наверно тысячи часов. Но ввиду что уже нету и времени, не сил игра уже померкла купил как говорится чтобы была. Динамика конечно менее экшовая чем в ксго, но ностольгия по контре как говорится можно притом что в отличии от кс1.6 тыт только движок и измененые карты + всеми любимая физика бочек и тому подобной мишуры при которой мой ПЕНЬ 4 очень сильно тормозил на особо одаренных картах что греха таить в Суорс по моему само много карт присутствовала на серверах теперь не в курсе но в ксго как то все одно и тоже офис даст 2 и мало карт я там играл на серверах. Игра годная, возможно кому не нравиться новая версия понравиться это довольно классическая версия горячо любомой в нашем сигменте игра
AK-47 smallest weapon spread in Counter Strike history 11 Doritos out 10 Mtn Dews :D IGN
